1953 Chevrolet Corvettes are by nature rare. What you might not realize is they were also all
, as you can clearly see in the video below. Armed with this knowledge, there’s no looking at the sports car differently in the future.

Just as amazing is how GM assembly workers dressed to assemble the Corvettes. Frist off, they’re in getups which look more like what you’d expect a soda fountain employee to wear, but that was the mode of the time.
